#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define lld long long int
#define MOD 1000000007

lld expo(lld base, lld exp) 
{
    lld res=1;
    while(exp>0) 
	{
       if(exp%2==1) res=(res*base)%MOD;
       base=(base*base)%MOD;
       exp/=2;
    }
    return res;
}

int main()
{
	ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	lld t,n,m,ans,i;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==1)
		{
			cout<<m<<"\n";
		}
		else
		if(n==2)
		{
			cout<<m*(m-1)<<"\n";
		}
		else
		{
			ans = (m*(m-1))%MOD;
			ans = (ans*expo(m-2,n-2))%MOD;
			cout<<ans<<"\n";
		}
		
	}
}
